attributes.action: Coding, Programming and Software Creation Compulsory in School
attributes.additional_details:
As the world becomes more reliant of technology we must equip our children in the best manner we can.

There are a number of subjects that are compulsory at primary and secondary school, the signatories of this E-Petition believe that coding, programming and software creation should also be a compulsory subject under the name 'Computer Programming'.

If we don't rise to the challenge we will be left behind other global competitors in the US, China and Japan.
